alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:12PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. Charles and north central Lafourche Parishes through 445 PM CDT... At 411 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mathews, or 10 miles northeast of Houma, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lockport, Mathews, Bayou Gauche, Des Allemands and Raceland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
